q2: they didn't do so well last season
a2: They under performed again. Klopp didn't manage them well and their fans are terrible.
q3: What makes you say Liverpool fans are terrible?
a3: They are the best fans in the world for sticking with Liverpool.
q4: What is their motto? I believe it's quite famous.
q5: What does Liverpool's YNWA stand for?
a5: Don't tell me you have no idea!
